DOC.brief_summary: A two month intervention trial assess effect Vetal Laban contain L. acidophilus enhance functional bowel wellbeing among subject irritable bowel syndrome ( IBS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Vetal Laban Intervention Trial Assessing Bowel Symptoms
DOC.criteria: Males female age 18 65 year Subjects fulfil Rome III criterion IBS Sufficient health orientation participate trial Obtained his/her informed consent verbal write information . Have high probability compliance completion study . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 19 35 . Diagnosed suspected organic gastrointestinal disease ( i.e . colitis , Crohn 's disease , celiac disease , major bowel surgery , recurrent diverticulitis ) severely impaired general health include cancer cancer therapy . Lactose intolerance Unwillingness refrain probiotic use trial Use antibiotic within 3 preceding month prior recruitment Pregnant , plan pregnancy lactate Expected major lifestyle change relate nutrition , exercise , travel etc . Participation clinical trial investigational product drug within 3 month prior screen . Substance abuse Subjects unable read understand questionnaire
